DDL.statement: ALTER SCHEMA `{database}` CHARACTER SET {charset} COLLATE '{collation}';

CREATE TABLE `APP_DESPATCH` ( `DESPATCH_NO` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `DESPATCH_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `LOCATION_ID_FROM` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `TOTAL_PALLETS` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT NULL, `LOCATION_ID_TO` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `TRAILER` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `HAULIER` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `TRANSACTION_REF` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`DESPATCH_NO`), UNIQUE KEY `PK_MATERIAL_DESPATCH` (`DESPATCH_NO`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_LOCATION` ( `LOCATION_ID` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `PLANT` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `WAREHOUSE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `GLN` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `STORAGE_LOCATION` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `STORAGE_TYPE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `STORAGE_SECTION` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `STORAGE_BIN` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `EQUIPMENT_TRACKING_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`LOCATION_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_MATERIAL` ( `MATERIAL` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `MATERIAL_TYPE` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `BASE_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `PRODUCTION_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `ISSUE_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `SHELF_LIFE_UOM` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'D', `SHELF_LIFE` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '0', `SHELF_LIFE_RULE` varchar(1) DEFAULT '+', `GROSS_WEIGHT` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '0', `NET_WEIGHT` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '0', `WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `OLD_MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `DEFAULT_BATCH_STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `DEFAULT_PALLET_STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `PRODUCTION_QUANTITY` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `STORAGE_UNIT_TYPE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `EQUIPMENT_TYPE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`MATERIAL`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_MATERIAL_BATCH` ( `MATERIAL` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `BATCH_NUMBER` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `EXPIRY_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`MATERIAL`,`BATCH_NUMBER`), UNIQUE KEY `BATCH_PK` (`MATERIAL`,`BATCH_NUMBER`), CONSTRAINT `sys_c004058` FOREIGN KEY (`material`) REFERENCES `APP_MATERIAL` (`MATERIAL`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_MATERIAL_UOM` ( `MATERIAL` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `UOM` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `EAN` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, `VARIANT` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `NUMERATOR` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '1', `DENOMINATOR` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`MATERIAL`,`UOM`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_PALLET` ( `SSCC` varchar(18) NOT NULL, `LOCATION_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `BATCH_NUMBER` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL, `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `QUANTITY` decimal(22,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.000', `UOM` varchar(10) NULL, `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `EAN` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, `VARIANT` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `DESPATCH_NO` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `CONFIRMED` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `LAYERS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SSCC`), KEY `BATCH_NUMBER_IDX` (`BATCH_NUMBER`), KEY `PROCESS_ORDER_IDX` (`PROCESS_ORDER`), KEY `PALLET_MATERIAL_LOOKUP` (`MATERIAL`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_PALLET_HISTORY` ( `TRANSACTION_REF` decimal(22,0) NOT NULL, `TRANSACTION_TYPE` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `TRANSACTION_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `SSCC` varchar(18) NOT NULL, `LOCATION_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `BATCH_NUMBER` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL, `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `QUANTITY` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `UOM` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `EAN` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, `VARIANT` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `DESPATCH_NO` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `CONFIRMED` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `LAYERS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `PK_APP_PALLET_HISTORY` (`TRANSACTION_REF`,`TRANSACTION_TYPE`,`TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE`,`TRANSACTION_DATE`,`SSCC`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_PROCESS_ORDER` ( `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `DUE_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `LOCATION_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `RECIPE_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `REQUIRED_QUANTITY` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `REQUIRED_UOM` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `DEFAULT_PALLET_STATUS` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROCESS_ORDER`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_UOM` ( `UOM` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `ISO_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `LOCAL_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`UOM`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_UOM_CONVERSION` ( `UOM_FROM` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `UOM_TO` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `NUMERATOR` decimal(22,0) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `DENOMINATOR` decimal(22,0) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`UOM_FROM`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `BAR_EAN_DEFS` ( `APPLICATION_ID` varchar(4) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `DATA_TYPE` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `DECIMAL_INDICATOR` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `MAX_DATA_LENGTH` bigint(10) DEFAULT NULL, `FIXED_VARIABLE` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `CHECK_DIGIT` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`APPLICATION_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `SYS_INTERFACE` ( `INTERFACE_TYPE` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `INTERFACE_DIRECTION` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `PATH` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ENABLED` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `DEVICE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `SUBJECT` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `TOPIC` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `SERVER` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `USERNAME` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `FORMAT` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `UOM_CONVERSION` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `ENABLE_EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL_FLAGS` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL_ADDRESSES` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`INTERFACE_TYPE`,`INTERFACE_DIRECTION`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `SYS_INTERFACE_LOG` ( `EVENT_TIME` datetime NOT NULL, `INTERFACE_LOG_ID` decimal(22,0) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `MESSAGE_REF` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `INTERFACE_TYPE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `MESSAGE_INFORMATION` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `INTERFACE_DIRECTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `ACTION` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `MESSAGE_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `MESSAGE_STATUS` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `MESSAGE_ERROR` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`EVENT_TIME`,`INTERFACE_LOG_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `SYS_INTERFACE_REQUEST` ( `EVENT_TIME` datetime NOT NULL, `INTERFACE_LOG_ID` decimal(22,0) NOT NULL, `INTERFACE_TYPE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `TRANSACTION_REF` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`EVENT_TIME`,`INTERFACE_LOG_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `SYS_MODULES` ( `MODULE_ID` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `RF_ACTIVE` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `DK_ACTIVE` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `MODULE_TYPE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `HINT` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `MNEMONIC` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '0', `ICON_FILENAME` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `HELPSET_ID` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `REPORT_FILENAME` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `EXEC_FILENAME` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `EXEC_DIR` varchar(80) DEFAULT NULL, `PRINT_PREVIEW` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `PRINT_DIALOG` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'N', `PRINT_COPIES` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`MODULE_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `SYS_USERS` ( `USER_ID` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `LANGUAGE_ID` varchar(2) DEFAULT 'EN', `USER_COMMENT` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `LAST_LOGON` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `ACCOUNT_LOCKED` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'N', `PASSWORD_EXPIRES` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `PASSWORD_CHANGE_ALLOWED` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `BAD_PASSWORD_ATTEMPTS` decimal(22,0) DEFAULT '0', `ACCOUNT_EXPIRES` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'N', `ACCOUNT_EXPIRY_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL_ADDRESS` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`USER_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
